General.Name: Leaf Mobile Inc
General.Description: East Side Games Group Inc., through its subsidiaries, develops, operates, and publishes free-to-play mobile games in Canada, the United States, Europe, and internationally. It also develops IdleKit, a proprietary game framework that allows developing of narrative-driven idle games. The company also engages in the sale of in-game virtual items through in-app purchases. East Side Games Group Inc. is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 510 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3A8
